sqlGroup.name: portrait_transfer
sqlGroup.sql: 转账关系
付款人,付款人姓名,付款人性别,收款人,收款人姓名,收款人性别,交易时间,插入时间戳
select user_id,pay_name,pay_sex,receive_id,receive_name,receive_sex,trans_time,daily_date from hb_LABEL_TRANS_RELATION_RESULT

sqlGroup.name: portrait_relation_group
sqlGroup.sql: 类别信息
select user_id,recent_trans_name,recent_trans_time,closed_name,update_time from hb_label_trans_result

sqlGroup.name: portrait_relation
sqlGroup.sql: 人际关系
select user_id,pay_name,receive_id,receive_name,total_amt,total_count,update_date from hb_label_trans_graph

sqlGroup.name: portrait_trading
sqlGroup.sql: 交易
select daily_date,trade_thirty_count,trade_thirty_money,trade_type from bdlbl.tl_usr_month_trade_summary_info_orc_int_day

sqlGroup.name: portrait_30_trading
sqlGroup.sql: 交易
select date_month,sum(trade_month_count) as tc from hb_label_threemonth_trade_summary

sqlGroup.name: portrait_trading_sum
sqlGroup.sql: 交易
select user_id,trade_thirty_count,trade_thirty_money,date_year,date_week,rank() over(order by date_year,date_week) as rownum from hb_label_thirty_trade_summary

sqlGroup.name: portrait_trading_money
sqlGroup.sql: 交易
select max(decay_money) as decay_money from hb_label_trade_decay

sqlGroup.name: portrait_trading_count
sqlGroup.sql: 交易
select max(decay_count) from hb_label_trade_decay

sqlGroup.name: portrait_trading_proportion
sqlGroup.sql: 交易
select sum(decay_count)from hb_label_trade_decay

sqlGroup.name: portal_userLabel
sqlGroup.sql: 用户标签

SELECT ecif_cust_no,mobile,branch_id,inn_org_nm,inn_org_sht_nm,inn_org_zone_cd,inn_org_lvl_cd,org_lvl_nm,cert_no,name,acct_no,industry,total_debt,sex,marriage,age,generation,constellation,positions,job,smb_flag,ortsal_flag,onselfbank_flag,religion,nation,inn_org_zone_desc,common_area,migrant_workers,travel_mode,reg_year,total_assets,user_cert_level,edu_bg,loan_purpose,ass_mode,travel_crowd,trade_area,hold_product_services,fund_use,join_activities_num,pay_transfer_channel,prod_func_consum_prefer,consum_prefer,trade_thirty_count,trade_thirty_money,trade_date,card_type,media_mode,pay_prefer,route_desc,bank_in_or_out,trade_prefer,transfer_prefer,deposit_prod_prefer,other_card,colony,firend_rela,web_evt_time,web_search,complain,message,web_use_time,searchengine,terminal,help,ad,active_feature,active_func_feature,search_keyword,liushi_keyword,user_id,daily_date,date_year,date_week,smb_flag_unkown,constellation_unkown,hold_product_services_high_v_user,positions_others,age_young_age,constellation_mojie,generation_50b,user_cert_level_2,transfer_prefer_3,constellation_tianping,trade_date_6,edu_bg_1,bank_in_or_out_out,total_assets_lower,card_type_golden_card,deposit_prod_prefer_1,nation_minority,religion_yes,marriage_unkown FROM bdlbl.tl_label_user_result

sqlGroup.name: label_label_wall
sqlGroup.sql: 所有标签表
select max(topic_desc) as topic_desc ,topic,max(label_desc) as label_desc,label_code as label_code,max(label_only) as label_only,sum(total) as total from bdlbl.tl_label_labelwall_all_result

sqlGroup.name: label_label_grouping
sqlGroup.sql: 用户标签表
select max(topic_desc) as topic_desc ,topic,max(label_desc) as label_desc,label_code as label_code,max(label_only) as label_only,sum(total) as total from bdlbl.tl_label_labelwall_result

sqlGroup.name: use_time_label
sqlGroup.sql: 使用时段标签
select use_time, use_time_name, begin_use_time, end_use_time, oper_time, oper_user from test.use_time_table order by oper_time desc limit 7

sqlGroup.name: use_time_label_config
sqlGroup.sql: 配置使用时段标签
insert into test.use_time_table (use_time, use_time_name, begin_use_time, end_use_time, oper_time, oper_user) values SQL_CONDITION

sqlGroup.sql: 用户
select user_id,ecif_cust_no,name,inn_org_zone_desc,inn_org_nm,total_assets,total_debt from bdlbl.tl_label_user_result
